meanings.definition: A condition characterized by difficulty reading and writing.
meanings.sent1: Many students with dyslexias benefit from specialized reading programs.
meanings.sent2: The school offers support for students with dyslexias.
meanings.sent3: The dyslexias in the class made for some interesting spelling mistakes.
meanings.sent4: Her dyslexias were like a puzzle, each word a piece out of place.
meanings.sent5: The struggles of dyslexias can be overcome with patience and practice.

meanings.definition: The presence of dyslexia in an individual or group.
meanings.sent1: The dyslexias in the family were well understood and supported.
meanings.sent2: The dyslexias among the students were recognized and addressed.
meanings.sent3: The dyslexias at the party led to some amusing word mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: His dyslexias were a cloud over his academic achievements.
meanings.sent5: The dyslexias in the community highlighted the need for awareness and education.
